Query.Sql: select distinct replace(NHS_Number, ' ', '') as NHS_Number, Regimen, Drug_Name, Actual_Dose_Per_Administration, Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose, Administration_Date from omop_staging.sact_staging

Explanation.Description: The name of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy drug given to a PATIENT during an Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Regimen.
Specific combination of drugs and their scheduled administration plan used to treat a patient's cancer
SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY ADMINISTRATION DATE is the date of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration or the date an oral drug was initially dispensed to the PATIENT.
The actual Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy dose given in each Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration in a Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Cycle.
The UNIT OF MEASUREMENT used for each Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration in a Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Cycle.
